author: Darlene Yudell
text: Has anyone developed incentives or a program designed to bring out ideas in staff, evaluate the ideas for feasibility, acknowledge good ideas that have been evaluated but for one reason or another are not feasible at this time and/or reward all appropriate staff whose ideas are tried and proven?
title: Incentives to genenerate ideas and reward good ones?
